com.snapscreen.sdk.ui

Interface SnapResultsItemConfigurator


  • public interface SnapResultsItemConfigurator
    Provides customization capabilities for the Snap Results View. Pass a class object when instantiating the SnapActivity which gets instantiated when displaying snap results.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean configureViewHolderForSearchResultEntry(RecyclerView.ViewHolder viewHolder, SnapResultsItemViewType viewType, SearchResultEntry searchResultEntry)
      The adapter in the Snap Results View calls this method for configuring a view holder with the given search result entry.
      RecyclerView.ViewHolder createViewHolderForSearchResultEntry(android.view.ViewGroup parent, SnapResultsItemViewType viewType)
      The adapter in the Snap Results View calls this method for creating a new custom view holder.
      int getSnapResultsBackgroundColorResourceId()
      The adapter in the Snap Results View calls this method for configuring the background color of the recycler view (list).

    • Method Detail

      • createViewHolderForSearchResultEntry

        RecyclerView.ViewHolder createViewHolderForSearchResultEntry(android.view.ViewGroup parent,
                                                             SnapResultsItemViewType viewType)
        The adapter in the Snap Results View calls this method for creating a new custom view holder. If you want the default visualization for a given item type, return null.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent viewGroup the view holder should be attached to
        viewType - the view type of the item that will get displayed
        Returns:
        a custom view holder or null if you want default visualization for this item type

      • configureViewHolderForSearchResultEntry

        boolean configureViewHolderForSearchResultEntry(RecyclerView.ViewHolder viewHolder,
                                                SnapResultsItemViewType viewType,
                                                SearchResultEntry searchResultEntry)
        The adapter in the Snap Results View calls this method for configuring a view holder with the given search result entry. If you want the default visualization for a given item type, leave the view holder untouched and return false.
        Parameters:
        viewHolder - the view holder to configure
        viewType - the view type of the item that should get displayed
        searchResultEntry - the result entry to be displayed
        Returns:
        true if the view holder was configured or false if the default configuration should take place

      • getSnapResultsBackgroundColorResourceId

        int getSnapResultsBackgroundColorResourceId()
        The adapter in the Snap Results View calls this method for configuring the background color of the recycler view (list). Return -1 to apply the default color.
        Returns:
        a color resource id or -1 for the default color
